author: bnicholes
msg: Both the r->user and r->ap_auth_type were set previously when the username and password were extracted from the request.  Resetting them at the end of the handler will overwrite any changes made by the authn provider.  For example, the ldap authn provider can be configured to change the user name to a full user dn.
